EmailTemplate.description: Invite to CS partners in NY
EmailTemplate.name: 18-0223 CS NY Brewery Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Come drink beer & talk solar with BlueWave!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Come join BlueWave Solar to drink beer & talk solar next week!
WHERE: Captain Lawrence Brewery, 444 Saw Mill River Rd, Elmsford, NY 10523 WHEN: Thursday, March 1st, Anytime after 4pm WHY: Get to know BlueWave, we've just arrived in New York offering solar financing!
Please RSVP to this email if you'd like to attend,
We hope to see you there! -All of us here at BlueWave
